title: Step 53

challengeFiles.name: main

tests.text: You should delete pass and create an if statement that checks if the value returned by self.find_empty_cell is None.
You should return True from your new if statement body.

description: Delete pass and create an if statement that checks if the value returned by find_empty_cell is None. In that case, the puzzle is solved. Therefore, return True from the if body.
